name: Missileman's Christmas Calamity
description:
Missileman is back in school for the holidays!

In this chaotic adventure, a Santa mech built by Dr. Otto has run loose and is wreaking havoc upon the city. What will the ABSO Robo High staff be able to do about it? Why, count on Missileman to clean up the mess, of course! After all, this wouldn't be his first time.  

This short little game is available to play completely for free, though you can pay an amount of money if you would like to support my ventures in indie game development. 

The game can be played directly in your web browser or offline by downloading it.

CONTROLS:

Arrows - Move

Up Arrow - Talk to NPCs

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

F4 / Alt+F4 / Fn+F4 - Fullscreen or windowed mode (Downloadable version only - the buttons needed for the function may vary between Windows computers)

Esc - Close the game (Downloadable version only)
